text:
Came at 7.50pm on a Friday night but only 1 donut left. Not sure if the opening hours on google (till 9.30pm) is correct?
Happens quite often on weekend nights too

üü® Krispy Kreme
üü¶1 Harbour Front Walk, B2-K26
VivoCity mall, Singapore 098585

üü† On 9th May 2025 Fri evening, I had visited the Krispy Kreme outlet here at Vivocity and picked up a couple of their famous Original Glazed doughnuts.

üü® The decor of the donut kiosk was modern and sleek, fitting well with the overall aesthetic of Vivocity Mall.

üü® The service was pleasant, with this cashier staff being particularly friendly, smiley and helpful. ‚¨õÔ∏è She also allowed me to take photos of the kiosk.  üî∑Ô∏è Thank you for the kind hospitality.

üü§  The real stars of the show, however, were the doughnuts. ‚û°Ô∏èThe Original Glazed ones were as always, absolutely delicious - soft, fluffy, and perfectly sweet. It is no wonder they are a favourite among doughnut lovers.

Was told off rudely by Filipino cashier when I enquired if they were open (10:59am but opening hours was 11am). "Not opened yet! And I need to display these first before I can open cos today there is a promotion!" Then the next min, she promptly sells donuts to a customer who spoke Tagalog.

Wanted to get a donut but I queued at the wrong place and this Malay lady shouted till I‚Äôm shocked and walked off. I don‚Äôt usually give reviews coz I‚Äôm in F&B line too and I know how it feels if given a negative comment, but this lady she seriously need to go for IWG courses if she wants to work as a front liner

Just had the popular hotselling Hazlenut donut. There was no queue when I visited the outlet close to 10am. Service was fast. The donut is soft and glazed with sugar icing on the outside and filled with hazelnut within. it is for the very sweet tooth.
